Name: Snugpak
Natural: The Snugpak Scorpion 2 IX is a compact, four-season two-person tent featuring a 5000mm HH PU flysheet, lightweight aluminum poles, and No-See-Um mesh, perfect for mountaineers, military users, and harsh-weather adventurers.

Name: TETON Sports
Natural: The TETON Sports Mountain Ultra Tent offers waterproof 2-person shelter with 2 doors, built-in ventilation, heat-sealed seams, and an easy 1-person setup, ideal for lightweight backpackers seeking durability and simplicity.

Name: Terra Nova
Natural: The Terra Nova Southern Cross 1 is a freestanding, four-season, one-person tent with fast pitching, a spacious vestibule, and full waterproofing, built for year-round backpacking adventures.

Name: Mountain Hardwear
Natural: The Mountain Hardwear Mineral King 2 Tent features oversized doors for panoramic views, adaptable fly for stargazing, DAC Pressfit poles, and a lightweight waterproof build, perfect for campers wanting livable comfort and scenery.

Name: Zpacks
Natural: The Zpacks Duplex is an ultralight two-person trekking pole tent weighing just 20 oz, crafted for minimalist adventurers seeking trail-tested durability and award-winning minimalist design.

Name: The North Face
Natural: The North Face Stormbreak 2 is a roomy two-person tent featuring large doors, twin-zip vestibules, high-low ventilation, and easy-pitch design, built for classic, comfortable camping experiences.

Name: Marmot
Natural: The Marmot Limelight 2P Tent offers a roomy 2-person design with pre-bent poles, dual vestibules, bathtub floor, and included footprint, providing spacious, durable shelter for three-season camping.

Name: NEMO
